functions.tag: {pages:['{"text":"Reinforcement of Fortune\'s Chisel:\\n\\n1x Fortune\'s Chisel\\n32x Bottle o\' Enchanting\\n1x Netherite Ingot\\n1x Smithing Tongs\\n\\nAll materials need to be put together on an anvil."}'],title:"Reinforcement - Fortune's Chisel",author:unknown,generation:1,display:{Lore:["Fortune's Chisel"]}}
